subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Matjaz Kopitar, coach of Slovenia’s hockey team, worked for 30 years to reach the Olympics. Now, with the help of his son Anze, the nation’s hockey aspirations have never been higher.
snippet: Matjaz Kopitar, coach of Slovenia’s hockey team, worked for 30 years to reach the Olympics. Now, with the help of his son Anze, the nation’s hockey aspirations have never been higher.
